name: Feed 'em Up
description:
Feed 'em Up

“Feed ‘em Up” is a minigame in which the players earn points by feeding the right Food to the customer. But pay attention to the food in the ovens or your restaurant may burn down.

Controls

Drag n Drop the food from the oven to the table. Each table has a preferred food. If the food is too long on the oven it will burn down your restaurant (Game Over)

+10 Points for delivering the right food

-30 Points for delivering the wrong food

-50 points for dropping the food on the floor

Credits

Game Designer ~ Paulina Pabst
